Dialogue: What're ya doin' back here again kid? World didn't end so you're back to test my patience, that right?
What's that? You're lookin' for something to use against Flake?
He's annoyin' as hell but that's not enough to kill the man.
HOLD UP, he's the reason why it reeks around here?!
Now that's a GOOD reason right there to cause him some pain.
Pollutin' my land. Who does he think he is!
Fine, I'll give ya somethin' that washed up a few days ago. Take this bug spray.
Use it right and that bastard will be in the ground where he belongs.
Since ya gave me this info, I'll let you roam my sewer freely.
Flake knows good n' well that the sea next to his beach flows directly through my sewer.
That waste he's been dropping has been causin' me all sorts of grief.
Only YOU are allowed here. If ya bring someone else, I'll show ya the reason they call me snaps.
